‘Major traffic delays’ in Tauranga for at least two days as emergency repairs undertaken on SH29A near Ōropi https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/major-traffic-delays-in-tauranga-for-at-least-two-days-as-emergency-repairs-undertaken- on-sh29a-near-oropi/UGHCHSOZ4JCLLK7TBXMQ2NKJAA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/major-traffic-delays-in-tauranga-for-at-least-two-days-as-emergency-repairs-undertaken- on-sh29a-near-oropi/UGHCHSOZ4JCLLK7TBXMQ2NKJAA/ Sandra ConchieMotorists can expect major delays due to repairs on SH29A near Oropi Sun, 11 Feb 2024 00:33:06 +0000 Major traffic delays and severe congestion on SH29A near Oropi and in and out of Mount Maunganui are expected on February 12 and 13 due to unexpected roading repairs.

Sat, 10 Feb 2024 23:09:55 +0000 Police got a bit too close to the action in Whangārei on Friday night, arresting one man.

Bay of Plenty man who lost leg in farming accident now helping amputees https://www.nzherald.co.nz/rotorua-daily-post/news/bay-of-plenty-man-who-lost-leg-in-farming-accident-now-helping-amputee-community/S6EVCI6QTJE5LIPFPGWONOBUM4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/rotorua-daily-post/news/bay-of-plenty-man-who-lost-leg-in-farming-accident-now-helping-amputee-community/S6EVCI6QTJE5LIPFPGWONOBUM4/ Megan Wilson'I can’t even describe... how painful that was. Like the pain went through my organs.' Sat, 10 Feb 2024 22:10:31 +0000 Peke Waihanga Artificial Limb Service peer support and events co-ordinator Matthew Bryson (right) and American professional trail runner and disability advocate Zachary Friedley. Photo / Andrew Warner
Northland’s Underwood Wetland reversing habitat loss https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/northlands-underwood-wetland-turning-habitat-loss-upside-down/RNSIFGLL6VCF3GAJ6IPKS7ZR4Y/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/northlands-underwood-wetland-turning-habitat-loss-upside-down/RNSIFGLL6VCF3GAJ6IPKS7ZR4Y/ Denise PiperThe project has created 10ha of wetland and preserved a remnant native forest. Sat, 10 Feb 2024 22:00:00 +0000 Game Bird Habitat Trust’s Robert Sowman and Andy Garrick, former landowner David Underwood, Andy Tannock from the trust, Fish & Game’s Corina Jordan and Rudi Hoetjes and former Auckland Regional Councillor Mike Lee celebrate the completion of the Underwood Wetland project on World Wetlands Day. Photo / Richard Cosgrove Fish & Game NZ
